topic.title: FUCK the EU
topic.body:
every fucking page i visit shows me an annoying popup saying crap like "we use cookies, we value your privacy please accept our privacy"

if i use a Proxy or TOR to circumvent i get captchas nonstop

FUCK YOU AND YOR FUCKING LAWS YOU FUCKING BUREAUCRAT FUCKHEADS!

1558691316_15Gk4wzjyNbPU3JZ31UnqMM3CMrX8.body: but what i like is that such laws will help projects like zeronet to grow

> [h3bhkj5gqz4n3pjm](#comment_155_1CKTRBy9N4RvE3FgeZJpQqFYtLHc37yo11): "we value your privacy please accept our privacy" typical masonic doublespeak rhetoric, anyway... [...]

Great! Thanks! Do you know a similar Addon that i can use in my offline life? Not only on websites.

> [anal](#comment_6_1DSnM3xHWxHbkHCADMTfhvXMfZDE34vwQJ): You mean fuck the people who abuses cookies, lie to you and sell every detail of your life that's linked to IT stuff such as social media right ? I get that some of you hate the EU but you're just being dishonest ungrateful fucks here. The GDPR move CLEARLY benefits us.

YES it helps zeronet to grow
